Scan_QR_code_to_claim_credential_or_requ: Scan QR code to request a credential or verify one below
Login_with_your_personal_questions_Tap_h: Login using your personal questions? Tap here
What_is_the_name_of_your_first_pet: What is the name of your first pet?
What_is_the_name_of_your_first_teacher: What is the name of your first teacher?
What_is_the_surname_of_your_mother_befor: What was your mother's surname before the wedding?
Login_with_your_passphrase_Tap_here: Login with your passphrase? Tap here
Please_store_this_in_a_safe_place_to_rec: Please keep the passphrase in a safe place to recover your account in the future, this passphrase will be shown only this time!
Scan_QR_to_verify_or_obtain_credentials_: Scan the QR to present or request a credential...
To_scan_QR_codes_allow_us_to_use_your_ca: to scan QR codes, allow the app to use the camera, in Settings > Privacy > Camera
Nothing_in_your_wallet: There is no Credential in your wallet
your_friendly_and_trustable_opensource_w: your friendly and trustable open-source identity wallet.
Manage_VC_verifiable_credentials_in_one_: Manage your verifiable credentials (VC) in one place
enter_your_email_to_get_started: enter your email to get started
to_ensure_the_security_of_your_account_a: No one can read your answers! The answers are used to generate (and later regenerate) your secret keys. They are neither stored nor communicated to anyone.
Please_choose_both_secure_and_easily_mem: You can answer providing correct information, or just write some text (please note your answers if you do so). The answers will be needed again to login on a different device.
your_unique_keypair_has_been_generated_s: your keyring, containing all your secret keys, has been generated successfully.
Make_sure_to_store_it_in_a_safe_location: Make sure to store it safely.
Reenter_your_email_address_to_confirm_re: Re-enter your email address to confirm registration.
You_can_recover_your_keypair_by_answerin: You can recover your keyring by answering the security questions correctly again or using this passphrase.
on_boarding_subtitle_1: DIDroom supports multiple standards like EUDI-ARF (eIDAS 2.0), W3C-VC, W3C-DID and BBS zero-knowledge proofs.
on_boarding_subtitle_2: Use DIDroom to create a decentralized identity using W3C-DID (or EUDI-ARF).
on_boarding_subtitle_3: Request and store credentials with the DIDroom wallet, create issuance and verification services with the DIDroom dashboard and microservices.
if_you_have_stored_your_keypair_securely: if you have stored your passphrase securely, you can enter it below to access your wallet.
Work_in_progress: Not yet active, come back later
The_credential_issuer_is_currently_offli: The credential issuer is currently offline, you may try again later
User_already_exists_try_to_login_or_requ: User already exists try to login or request a new password
